text: Sparta is an unincorporated community in Buchanan County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== Sparta was originally called Benton, and under the latter name was platted in 1840. A post office called Sparta was established in 1841, and remained in operation until 1865. The community held the county seat until about 1846. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Buchanan County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Sparta, Buchanan County, Missouri
